ChangesOneBowie

Artist
David Bowie
Release date
20 May 2016 (first released: 21 May 1976)
Format
Vinyl (LP, Compilation, Reissue, Stereo)
Genres
Rock, Pop
View on Discogs

Tracklist

  1. Space Oddity
  2. John, I'm Only Dancing
  3. Changes
  4. Ziggy Stardust
  5. Suffragette City
  6. The Jean Genie
  7. Diamond Dogs
  8. Rebel Rebel
  9. Young Americans
  10. Fame
  11. Golden Years

Notes

Issued with a white die-cut poly lined inner sleeve. Half of the copies are on black vinyl (this release), half on [url=https://www.discogs.com/release/8518115]clear vinyl[/url]. No mention of the vinyl colour on the sleeve or the sticker. Catalog number as COBLP 2016 0190295994082 on spine. Catalog number as 0190295994082 COBLP 2016 on rear sleeve. Catalog number as 0190295994082 on sticker. Catalog number as COBLP2016 on labels. Track A6 is listed as "Jean Genie" on back cover and "The Jean Genie" on label. All runout details are etched, Optimal plating symbols (e.g., 2=+, 2=Î›, etc.) are mirrored.
